meanings.definition: A diamond-shaped pattern consisting of overlapping diagonal lines.
meanings.sent1: The tablecloth had a beautiful argyle design.
meanings.sent2: She wore a cozy argyle sweater to stay warm.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the argyle pattern on the rug was a maze to explore.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline looked like an argyle of lights from afar.
meanings.sent5: The argyle on his socks made them stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: A knitted pattern of diamonds in various colors, typically used in sweaters and socks.
meanings.sent1: Grandma knitted me a pair of argyle socks for my birthday.
meanings.sent2: The store displayed a new collection of argyle sweaters.
meanings.sent3: The argyle on the scarf made it look like a rainbow of diamonds.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as bright and cheerful as an argyle pattern.
meanings.sent5: The argyle design on the hat matched perfectly with her gloves.
